creator: gregor@apache.org
text:
they seem to only be used by the StaticHTMLExporter and the LoadQuartzServlet,
both of which are scheduled for removal.

Maybe we should start a vote about removing the scheduler from 1.4 ... it's not
really usable anyway ATM.
creator: andreas@apache.org

text:
the code says:

deprecated, use the publish ant task instead

now that the ant tasks are themselves deprecated, what gives?
creator: gregor@apache.org

text:
Created attachment 15304
removes publishing classes, and most of the ant tasks as well
